title: how do i into shaco
body:
I def chose the wrong time to pick up shaco, but i was just wondering how one would go about playing shaco in the current jungle.
build paths and runes?
jungle clears?
i feel sluggish compared to other junglers.
also, can we have an indicator of the "backstab" hitbox becasue sometimes i hit people from the side and get the proc, and other times i hit from the back and i dont get it
also
{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:3}} 
or
{{summoner:11}} {{summoner:14}}
